channel.title: HyperShift on Validated Patterns
channel.description: Recent content in HyperShift on Validated Patterns

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Deploying the hosted control plane (HyperShift) pattern Prerequisites An OpenShift cluster To create an OpenShift cluster, go to the Red Hat Hybrid Cloud console.

item.title: Using HyperShift
item.description: Using HyperShift Assumptions You have an existing OpenShift cluster deployed You have installed the HyperShift pattern on your OpenShift cluster by following the Getting Started guide.
